{{Lang|'''Man Chai'''|yue=文仔|yue_rm=Man<sup>4</sup> Jai<sup>2</sup>}} is [[Gaming]]'s companion.

He is summoned into battle through Gaming's [[Elemental Burst]], [[Suanni's Gilded Dance]], and also appears in one of Gaming's idle animations.

==Profile==
===Appearance===
Man Chai resembles a red {{w|Nine sons of the dragon|suanni}} in appearance, with red ears, dark paws, and white and green whiskers, with a flame-like body.

==Character Mentions==
{{Character Mentions
|alias="the mythical beast by his side"
}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Man Chai's name is composed of the character {{Lang|yue={{wt|文}}|yue_rm=man<sup>4</sup>|yue_tl=gentle; refined|mini=1}} and the Cantonese diminutive suffix {{Lang|yue={{wt|仔}}|yue_rm=jai<sup>2</sup>|mini=1}}.
** In the English localization, Gaming states that the name means "well-behaved."<ref>{{Ref/VO|Gaming|Something to Share}}</ref>
